from pyspark.sql import functions as F, types as T
import uuid

def read_csv(path: str):
    return (spark.read.format("csv")
            .option("header", "true")
            .option("multiLine", "true")
            .option("quote", "\"")
            .option("escape", "\"")
            .option("mode", "PERMISSIVE")
            .load(path))

# Cases mapping file (your existing)
cases_map_path = "abfss://horizon-migration-poc@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/config/Cases/Cases.csv"

# Pivoted involvement folder
involv_folder = "abfss://horizon-migration-poc@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/MPESC-EXTRACT/LLAttr/Case_Involvement_95501/"

# Contacts extracts
person_path = "abfss://horizon-migration-poc@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/MPESC-EXTRACT/Contacts_Person.csv"
org_path    = "abfss://horizon-migration-poc@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/MPESC-EXTRACT/Contacts_Organisation.csv"

# Outputs
out_involv_contacts = "abfss://horizon-migration-poc@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/MPESC-TRANSFORM/CaseInvolvement/CaseInvolvement_Contacts.csv"
out_addresses       = "abfss://horizon-migration-poc@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/MPESC-TRANSFORM/Address/ContactAddress.csv"

involv_raw = read_csv(involv_folder)

print("involv_raw rows:", involv_raw.count())
print("involv_raw cols:", involv_raw.columns)
display(involv_raw.limit(10))

def nullify_undefined(expr):
    return F.when(F.trim(expr) == F.lit("undefined"), F.lit(None)).otherwise(expr)

involv = (involv_raw
    .withColumn("legacyCaseId", F.col("ID").cast("string"))
    .withColumn("legacyContactId", F.trim(F.col("20").cast("string")))   # KEEP as-is (incl P_0)
    .withColumn("typeOfInvolvement", F.trim(F.col("3").cast("string")))
    .withColumn("involvementStartDate", F.col("4").cast("string"))
    .withColumn("involvementEndDate", F.col("16").cast("string"))
    .withColumn("communicationPreference", F.col("17").cast("string"))
    .withColumn("externalReferenceNumber", F.col("18").cast("string"))
    .withColumn("contactDetails", F.col("19").cast("string"))
)

# Clean "undefined" strings -> null (but do not remove legacyContactId values like P_0 here)
involv = (involv
    .withColumn("legacyContactId", nullify_undefined(F.col("legacyContactId")))
    .withColumn("typeOfInvolvement", nullify_undefined(F.col("typeOfInvolvement")))
    .withColumn("involvementStartDate", nullify_undefined(F.col("involvementStartDate")))
    .withColumn("involvementEndDate", nullify_undefined(F.col("involvementEndDate")))
    .withColumn("communicationPreference", nullify_undefined(F.col("communicationPreference")))
    .withColumn("externalReferenceNumber", nullify_undefined(F.col("externalReferenceNumber")))
    .withColumn("contactDetails", nullify_undefined(F.col("contactDetails")))
    .withColumn("contactDetails",
        F.when(F.trim(F.col("contactDetails")) == F.lit("No Contact"), F.lit(None))
         .otherwise(F.col("contactDetails"))
    )
)

# Filter to only mapped cases (do NOT filter legacyContactId here)
involv_filtered = involv.join(cases_map, on="legacyCaseId", how="inner")

print("involv_filtered:", involv_filtered.count())
display(involv_filtered.limit(20))

people = (read_csv(person_path)
    .withColumn("legacyContactId", F.concat(F.lit("P_"), F.col("P_ID").cast("string")))
    .withColumn("contactSource", F.lit("person"))
    .withColumn("orgName", F.lit(None).cast("string"))
    .withColumn("firstName", F.trim(F.col("FirstName")))
    .withColumn("lastName",  F.trim(F.col("LastName")))
    .withColumn("email",     F.trim(F.col("Email")))
    .withColumn("telephoneNumber", F.coalesce(F.trim(F.col("TelephoneMobile")), F.trim(F.col("TelephoneOffice"))))
    .withColumn("poBox",        F.trim(F.col("POBox")))
    .withColumn("addressLine1", F.trim(F.col("Address1")))
    .withColumn("addressLine2", F.trim(F.col("Address2")))
    .withColumn("townCity",     F.trim(F.col("City")))
    .withColumn("county",       F.trim(F.col("County")))
    .withColumn("postcode",     F.trim(F.col("PostCode")))
    .withColumn("country",      F.trim(F.col("Country")))
    .select(
        "legacyContactId","contactSource","orgName","firstName","lastName",
        "telephoneNumber","email",
        "poBox","addressLine1","addressLine2","townCity","county","postcode","country"
    )
)

orgs = (read_csv(org_path)
    .withColumn("legacyContactId", F.concat(F.lit("O_"), F.col("ID").cast("string")))
    .withColumn("contactSource", F.lit("org"))
    .withColumn("orgName", F.trim(F.col("Name")))
    .withColumn("firstName", F.lit(None).cast("string"))
    .withColumn("lastName",  F.lit(None).cast("string"))
    .withColumn("email",     F.trim(F.col("Email")))
    .withColumn("telephoneNumber", F.trim(F.col("TelephoneOffice")))
    .withColumn("poBox",        F.trim(F.col("POBox")))
    .withColumn("addressLine1", F.trim(F.col("Address1")))
    .withColumn("addressLine2", F.trim(F.col("Address2")))
    .withColumn("townCity",     F.trim(F.col("City")))
    .withColumn("county",       F.trim(F.col("County")))
    .withColumn("postcode",     F.trim(F.col("PostCode")))
    .withColumn("country",      F.trim(F.col("Country")))
    .select(
        "legacyContactId","contactSource","orgName","firstName","lastName",
        "telephoneNumber","email",
        "poBox","addressLine1","addressLine2","townCity","county","postcode","country"
    )
)

contacts_dim = people.unionByName(orgs).dropDuplicates(["legacyContactId"])
print("contacts_dim:", contacts_dim.count())
display(contacts_dim.limit(20))

def norm_expr(e):
    return F.lower(F.trim(F.coalesce(e, F.lit(""))))

contacts_dim = (contacts_dim
    .withColumn("addressKey", F.concat_ws("|",
        norm_expr(F.col("poBox")),
        norm_expr(F.col("addressLine1")),
        norm_expr(F.col("addressLine2")),
        norm_expr(F.col("townCity")),
        norm_expr(F.col("county")),
        norm_expr(F.col("postcode")),
        norm_expr(F.col("country"))
    ))
    .withColumn("addressKey",
        F.when(F.col("addressKey") == F.lit("||||||"), F.lit(None)).otherwise(F.col("addressKey"))
    )
)

display(contacts_dim.select("legacyContactId","addressKey","postcode").limit(20))

# Recreate involv_with_contacts (left join keeps all filtered involvement rows)

involv_with_contacts = (
    involv_filtered
        .join(
            contacts_dim.select(
                "legacyContactId",
                "contactSource",
                "orgName",
                "firstName",
                "lastName",
                "email",
                "telephoneNumber",
                "addressKey",
                "poBox",
                "addressLine1",
                "addressLine2",
                "townCity",
                "county",
                "postcode",
                "country"
            ),
            on="legacyContactId",
            how="left"
        )
)

print("involv_with_contacts:", involv_with_contacts.count())
display(involv_with_contacts.limit(20))


NAMESPACE_UUID = uuid.UUID("6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c8")

@F.udf(returnType=T.StringType())
def uuid5_from_text(x: str):
    if x is None:
        return None
    return str(uuid.uuid5(NAMESPACE_UUID, x.strip().lower()))

contacts_in_scope = involv_with_contacts.select("legacyContactId").dropDuplicates()
contacts_dim_scope = contacts_in_scope.join(contacts_dim, on="legacyContactId", how="inner")

# pick a representative case per contact (a contact can appear on multiple cases)
contact_case = (involv_with_contacts
    .select("legacyContactId", "legacyCaseId", "caseId")
    .dropDuplicates()
    .groupBy("legacyContactId")
    .agg(
        F.first("legacyCaseId").alias("legacyCaseId"),
        F.first("caseId").alias("caseId")
    )
)

addresses = (contacts_dim_scope
    .filter(F.col("addressKey").isNotNull())
    .select(
        "legacyContactId",
        "addressKey",
        "poBox","addressLine1","addressLine2","townCity","county","postcode","country"
    )
    .join(contact_case, on="legacyContactId", how="left")
    # dedupe by addressKey but keep a representative legacyCaseId/caseId for traceability
    .groupBy("addressKey")
    .agg(
        F.first("poBox").alias("poBox"),
        F.first("addressLine1").alias("addressLine1"),
        F.first("addressLine2").alias("addressLine2"),
        F.first("townCity").alias("townCity"),
        F.first("county").alias("county"),
        F.first("postcode").alias("postcode"),
        F.first("country").alias("country"),
        F.first("legacyCaseId").alias("legacyCaseId"),
        F.first("caseId").alias("caseId"),
    )
    .withColumn("addressId", uuid5_from_text(F.concat(F.lit("address|"), F.col("addressKey"))))
)

print("addresses:", addresses.count())
display(addresses.limit(50))

# Build a contact -> addressId lookup (uses contacts_dim which DOES have addressKey)
contact_addr_lkp = (
    contacts_dim
      .select("legacyContactId", "addressKey")
      .join(addresses.select("addressKey", "addressId"), on="addressKey", how="left")
      .select("legacyContactId", "addressId")
)

# Attach addressId back to involvements using legacyContactId (present on left)
involv_final = involv_with_contacts.join(contact_addr_lkp, on="legacyContactId", how="left")

display(involv_final.limit(50))

# keep original "typeOfInvolvement" and add a mapped "contactTypeId"
involv_final = involv_final.withColumn("toi_norm", F.lower(F.trim(F.col("typeOfInvolvement"))))

involv_final = involv_final.withColumn(
    "contactTypeId",
    F.when(F.col("toi_norm") == "agent", "agent")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "other appellant's agent contact", "agent")

     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "case officer", "case-officer")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "assistant case officer", "case-officer")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "case manager", "case-officer")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "case administrator", "case-officer")

     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "consultee", "consultee")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "statutory consultee", "notified-party")

     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "government agency", "government-agency")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "member of parliament", "member-of-parliament")

     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "interested owner", "interested-owner")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "owner", "landowner")

     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "tenant", "tenant")

     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "lpa", "local-planning-authority")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "lpa agent", "lpa-agent")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "lpa contact", "lpa-contact")

     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "objector", "objector")

     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "order making authority", "order-making-authority")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "order making authority contact", "order-making-authority-contact")

     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "programme officer", "programme-officer")

     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "representer", "representer")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "representative", "representative")

     # mapping says "Legal Advisor -> Representative" and "Legal Officer -> Representative"
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "legal advisor", "representative")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "legal officer", "representative")

     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "sponsor", "sponsor")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "sponsor and contact details", "sponsor")

     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "third party", "third-party")

     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "cra", "commons-registration-authority")

     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "potential claimant", "potential-claimant")

     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "secretary of state (sos - key contact)", "secretary-of-state")

     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "originator", "other-party")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "panel member", "other-party")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "appointed person", "other-party")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "decision branch", "other-party")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "decision branch contact", "other-party")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "government office", "other-party")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "mayor of london", "other-party")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "planning officer", "other-party")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "non responding authority", "other-party")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "other non responding authority", "other-party")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "other non-responding authority", "other-party")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "other served with enforcement notice", "other-party")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "other party", "other-party")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "other", "other-party")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "ipl", "other-party")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "observed by", "other-party")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "regulator", "other-party")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "environmental services officer", "other-party")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "consent services unit", "other-party")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "reader", "other-party")

     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "rule 6(6) party", "interested-person-party")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "interested person", "interested-person-party")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "external support", "interested-person-party")
     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "electricity company", "interested-person-party")

     .when(F.col("toi_norm") == "collecting authority", "acquiring-authority")

     # everything else explicitly unmapped in your list stays NULL
     .otherwise(F.lit(None))
)

# optional: drop helper normalised column before writing
involv_final = involv_final.drop("toi_norm")

display(
    involv_final
    .select("typeOfInvolvement", "contactTypeId")
    .dropDuplicates()
    .orderBy("typeOfInvolvement")
)

(addresses.coalesce(1)
 .write.mode("overwrite")
 .option("header","true")
 .csv(out_addresses))
print("Wrote Address.csv:", out_addresses)

out = (involv_final
    .select(
        "caseId",
        "legacyCaseId",
        "legacyContactId",
        "typeOfInvolvement",
        "contactTypeId",
        "involvementStartDate",
        "involvementEndDate",
        "communicationPreference",
        "externalReferenceNumber",
        "contactDetails",
        "contactSource",
        "orgName",
        "firstName",
        "lastName",
        "email",
        "telephoneNumber",
        "addressId"
    )
)

(out.coalesce(1)
 .write.mode("overwrite")
 .option("header","true")
 .csv(out_involv_contacts))
print("Wrote CaseInvolvement_Contacts.csv:", out_involv_contacts)

print("missing contact matches:", involv_final.filter(F.col("contactSource").isNull()).count())
print("rows with null addressId:", involv_final.filter(F.col("addressId").isNull()).count())

display(involv_final
        .filter(F.col("contactSource").isNull())
        .select("legacyCaseId","caseId","legacyContactId","typeOfInvolvement","contactDetails")
        .limit(50))

from pyspark.sql import functions as F, types as T
import uuid

# output paths
out_applicant = "abfss://horizon-migration-poc@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/MPESC-TRANSFORM/Applicant/Applicant.csv"
out_authority = "abfss://horizon-migration-poc@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/MPESC-TRANSFORM/Authority/Authority.csv"
out_inspector = "abfss://horizon-migration-poc@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/MPESC-TRANSFORM/Inspector/Inspector.csv"

# deterministic ids for name-based tables
NAMESPACE_UUID = uuid.UUID("6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c8")

@F.udf(returnType=T.StringType())
def uuid5_name(x: str):
    if x is None:
        return None
    return str(uuid.uuid5(NAMESPACE_UUID, x.strip().lower()))

def contact_display_name(df):
    # Prefer orgName; else First Last; else contactDetails; else legacyContactId
    return (
        F.when(F.col("orgName").isNotNull() & (F.trim(F.col("orgName")) != ""), F.trim(F.col("orgName")))
         .when(
             (F.col("firstName").isNotNull() | F.col("lastName").isNotNull()),
             F.trim(F.concat_ws(" ", F.col("firstName"), F.col("lastName")))
         )
         .when(F.col("contactDetails").isNotNull() & (F.trim(F.col("contactDetails")) != ""), F.trim(F.col("contactDetails")))
         .otherwise(F.col("legacyContactId"))
    )

# normalised type for filters
df = out.withColumn("toi_norm", F.lower(F.trim(F.col("typeOfInvolvement"))))

# -------------------------
# 1) Applicant table export
# -------------------------
applicant_df = (df
    .filter(F.col("toi_norm") == F.lit("applicant"))
    .withColumn("name", contact_display_name(df))
    .select(
        uuid5_name(F.concat(F.lit("applicant|"), F.col("name"))).alias("id"),
        F.col("name")
    )
    .dropDuplicates(["id"])
)

print("Applicant rows:", applicant_df.count())
display(applicant_df.limit(50))

(applicant_df.coalesce(1)
 .write.mode("overwrite")
 .option("header","true")
 .csv(out_applicant))
print("Wrote Applicant.csv:", out_applicant)

# -------------------------
# 2) Authority table export
#    (you can tweak the types included)
# -------------------------
AUTHORITY_TYPES = ["lpa", "order making authority"]

authority_df = (df
    .filter(F.col("toi_norm").isin(AUTHORITY_TYPES))
    .withColumn("name", contact_display_name(df))
    .select(
        uuid5_name(F.concat(F.lit("authority|"), F.col("name"))).alias("id"),
        F.col("name")
    )
    .dropDuplicates(["id"])
)

print("Authority rows:", authority_df.count())
display(authority_df.limit(50))

(authority_df.coalesce(1)
 .write.mode("overwrite")
 .option("header","true")
 .csv(out_authority))
print("Wrote Authority.csv:", out_authority)

# -------------------------
# 3) Inspector staging export
# -------------------------
INSPECTOR_TYPES = [
    "assessor inspector",
    "assistant inspector",
    "inspector",
    "observing inspector",
    "previous inspector",
    "acceptance inspector",
    "pre-application inspector",
    # optional (include if you want)
    # "single inspector/panel chair",
]

inspector_stage = (df
    .filter(F.col("toi_norm").isin([t.lower() for t in INSPECTOR_TYPES]))
    .withColumn("inspectorName", contact_display_name(df))
    .select(
        "caseId",
        "legacyCaseId",
        "legacyContactId",
        F.col("typeOfInvolvement").alias("inspectorRole"),
        F.col("inspectorName").alias("inspectorName"),
        "email",
        "telephoneNumber",
        "contactDetails"
        # addressId intentionally omitted here (usually not relevant for inspectors)
    )
)

print("Inspector staging rows:", inspector_stage.count())
display(inspector_stage.limit(50))

(inspector_stage.coalesce(1)
 .write.mode("overwrite")
 .option("header","true")
 .csv(out_inspector))
print("Wrote Inspector.csv (staging):", out_inspector)
